scripts.tls:handshake: lsof -ti:8443 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && node examples/tsl/handshake/server.js & sleep 2 && node examples/tsl/handshake/client.js
scripts.tls:handshake:v1.2: lsof -ti:8443 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && export TLS_VERSION=TLSv1.2 && node examples/tsl/handshake/server.js & sleep 2 && node examples/tsl/handshake/client.js
scripts.websocket:handshake: lsof -ti:8080 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && node examples/websocket/handshake/server.js & sleep 2 && open examples/websocket/handshake/client.html
